about_the_game: To use this add-on, you must own DIRT 5. The vehicle can be used in all modes, including career, arcade and in multiplayer and online modes, except when vehicle type restrictions are applied.
detailed_description: To use this add-on, you must own DIRT 5. The vehicle can be used in all modes, including career, arcade and in multiplayer and online modes, except when vehicle type restrictions are applied.
